FuncDef: This command configures payload of the SONET/SDH group.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the components making up the specified SONET/SDH path. Depending on the type of SONET/SDH port the sonet-sdh-index must specify more path indexes to specify the payload location of the path.
Specifies the Tributary Unit Group (TUG3) on a path. Configures the port or channel for transport network use.
Configures the path as a virtual tributary group of type vt2.
Configures the path as a virtual tributary group of type vt15.
